description_html: For those who aspire to achieve iconic style and premium performance in the home, meet the new LA CUCINA line from SUPERIORE. Characterized by clean lines, robust materials, and diverse finishes, LA CUCINA offers new possibilities in the kitchen. The LA CUCINA 30" range features SUPERIORE's unique PANORAMA Window and versatile five gas brass burner configuration. The range also boasts an extra-large capacity gas, convection oven with infrared broiler, delivering the efficient performance every home chef craves. In addition to the 30" range, available in stainless steel, the LA CUCINA line also offers a 36" range, available in stainless steel and eight other cutting-edge colors in four daring finishes.
